unnormalised: Bharotantlea Bima Dhonanchem Gnan: Eka Samanya Manusacho Margdarshak
normalised: bharataant insurance dhôrnnaam somzôvnni: êk sâdhârônn mâṇôsachi margôddôvnni

unnormalised: Tor, tumi bima gheucheak chinttai, hanv? Borem kelem! Tem Ammann sadanch sangtalea suraksha jallea bhaxen – asun faido na zalear boro, punn zai asun mellonas zalear sonvos nashta. Punn atam khorem uloia, bima dhonam khub gunglapornn asunk xakta. Te soglle nem ani artincho… kanooni kagot vachlea bhaxen dista! Hem lek Indian bima dhonanchem sadhea English-int vichar korit, tumchea khatir mat.
normalised: ô, tumi insurance ghevnchek vichar kôrtât, hôy? bôrem kelêm! tem mhonnjê âimaamni aamkaam sadânh kallôlem surôkchitêchê jâlleam bhâxên - zai naslêmri legiit assa, zai assun legiit naslêmri pôlleeu. pôn aamkaam sôt sanga, insurance dhôrnnam atî gôndhôḷachem zâunk xaktâ. ti sôrbh vôrtu ani shôrtu… tem êk kânnddô pattr vôchlean bhâxên dista! hi lêkhi tumkaam sôdhik bhâratantlim kâim sâdhârônn insurance dhôrnnam sadhe english-aant tumkâchê khatir môddelem.

unnormalised: Poile pavtt, jivachi bima asa. Hem sadaroponnar tumche kuttumbik arthik suraksha dita, Dev naka mhonncho tumkam kainch zalear. Techint taka rupeani bhogtan bhairlea jivachik ek vhodd ugddas dita mhonn chintun gheiat. Tumkam term life bhaxen vikalp mellto, jem sadem ani sonvhallaiechem asta, vo whole life, jem savingacho bhag dhori. Premiums mahineak ₹500 itle kamicho suru korunk xakta, tumche vhoddpan ani cover-achi rakkamacher adarit. LIC, HDFC Life, ani ICICI Prudential bhaxen kampnichim dhonam tulna korat.
normalised: pôileam vostum zâlemri jeevit insurance assa. tî mhonnjê dev bôrô korum, tumkaam kôntri ghoddlyari tumchem kutmarthik nôdden surôkchit kôrtta. mêlelean sôrgaantun dâd vôddem ummo ditlo bhâxên assa, rupeaant dista. tumi term life-khi pôlyevnk mellttalim, tî atî mûḷbhût ani bôrvônn zâun assa, vo whole life-khi, dênt sônnchôvônnchô bhag assa. premium pânchxem rupiaam êk mhoinnaak suru zâunk xakta, tumchem vôi ani cover rêkmeponnar odhârit zâun. L-I-C, H-D-F-C life ani I-C-I-C-I prudential bhâxên cumpôniam dônnim dhôrnnam tulna korun pôlyêu.

unnormalised: Uprant swasthachi bima asa. Aizchea jagant, ek boro private hospitalak bhett, zoxem Apollo vo Max, tumchea pocheak chhed dita. Swasthachi bima te khorch dhapeak maddot korta. Tumkam veg-veglea dhonam vo kuttumba khatir floater yojna mellonk xaktat. Poil'lim asloli sthitichi rokddi wat ravcheacho somoy (samanyoponnan 2-4 vorsam) ani rokddin nollageche fasilitas vicharun gheiat. Tumkam khobor asa ek bori swasthachi bima yojna ₹1 crore meren khorch dhapunk xakta mhonn? Hacho mol kamik korunk naka!
normalised: magiir arogya insurance assa. âzhkêchê sânsarant bôrea khâsgî hôspîtal-khi bhête dovornn, apollo vo max-khi, tumchi jeb khâli kôrum zâta. arogya insurance te khôrc bhôrun diunk môtôt kôrtta. tumi eklektî insurance ghêvnk xaktât vo kutmbachê khatir yojna dhôrnnean ghevnk xaktât. puun châknnem assa, tumchea pôileyche bezaarêk râktâkêt thambôvnni (sâdhârônn rêknnem dônnim-tôrvârim vôrsaam) ani nêgd cash nêdhônnchim suvîdhaam. tumkaam khobor assa vo, bôrem arogya insurance rêkhem êk kôrrôr porênt rêkhem bhôrum zâta? dhonnttêchê mahattvôk unnem dôrônk naka!

unnormalised: Motor bima kanoonachea daktin compalsive asa, bhai! Tumchi scooty vo tumchi fancy SUV asun dhi, tumkam tenchi goroz asa. Don mukhel prakar asat: tisreo party, jem dusrea lokank vo jageank zata tem bharun korta, ani comprihansive, jem tumchea sovtachea vehiculak zata tem bharun korta. Online navin korunk samanyoponnan sosto asta, 20% meren discount uplabd asteleam. Tumchea lagim valid driving license asa mhonn thik korunk zai, ok?
normalised: motor insurance kânnddô bhaai, dêkhea! tumchi scooty asti vo tumchi shân dârêchi S-U-V, tumkaam tî zai. dênt dônnim mukya prakaram assa: tisôrek zânnmachêvôren, tî dônnimek zânnam vôstilim vo vôstel-khi khev ditli ani sôrbh prakrêm, tî tumchea svôtchê vaahan-khi rêkhem khev ditli. ônnline nêvônkorum zaata tem sôrv sôst zâunk xakta, dha vôrnn uprant dista sôddvonni mellttalî. tumkaam tumchem sôddvonni dêkhem láiçense asti kôrtâ?

unnormalised: Nimanne, ghara bima visrunaka. Ami Indian amchi jivachi saving amchea gharanim invest kortanv, khorench na? Ag, choranchi vo soobhavik aapdanchi rakhonn korop zaroori asa. Eke basic ghara bima dhonan structure ani bitorleo chizo eka thoddea vorsachea premium-an bharunk xaktat, ek standard apartmentak Rs. 2000 mhonn sangunk zata. Bajaj Allianz ani Tata AIG bhaxen compani comprihansive yojna ditalet.
normalised: nimânnem, tumi ghôrche insurance bhulonk naka. ami bhâratachê lok aplem sôrbh sônchêghôr aplea ghôraant guntteum, sôri? tee agnni dôrn, chor vô svabhâvache aapadun sâvâll ghevnk zâiem. êk mûḷbhût ghôrche insurance dhôrnnechim dhôrnni vôstil ani vôstilentil vastu thoddeam vôrshichê premium-khi divonk zâiem, rupeaant dônnim hâzâr sâdhârônn apârtamentek. bajaj allianz ani tata A-I-G bhâxên cumpôniam purêchnêm yojna ditâli.

unnormalised: Tumche research korat, quotes tulna korat, ani kainch sign korche poilim barik akshaream vachat. Ugddas dovrat, bima fakt khoroch nhoi, tem tumchea shantit investissement asa. Ani tench anmol, asa mhonnchea? Tumchea financial advisorak ulo marat, online aggregators check korat, ani tumchea gorjeam khatir chukti mhunn dhon nivddat. Soglleam borem!
normalised: tumcha sôdhôk lôkaak prôshnn diia, tulna korun pôlyevnk ani kânndô pattr vôchleak munni vôche pôiley. dhôrnnek sômbôndit jâllek tumi sôrbh kharchem dêkhnem tumkam bhôgmônn ditlo. ôrtaa divôrnni têchêm moleam asa, nâ? tumchea arthik solleak vocho, online vrôvrôk sôdhô korun pôlyevnk ani aplea zairaek sôdkôrta dhôrnnechô vickal ghêvm. sôrbh bôrem!
